profile_page.title: Profile
profile_page.subtitle: Manage your personal information and preferences
profile_page.ai_trainer_description: Get personalized workout and nutrition advice from our AI trainer
profile_page.error_updating: Error updating profile. Please try again.
profile_page.change_password_subtitle: Update your password to keep your account secure
profile_page.password_too_short: New password must be at least 8 characters long
profile_page.password_same_as_current: New password must be different from current password
profile_page.failed_update_password: Failed to update password. Please try again.
profile_page.security_tip_unique_password: Use a unique password that you don't use elsewhere
profile_page.security_tip_never_share: Never share your password with anyone
profile_page.no_measurements: No measurements recorded yet. Add your first measurement above!
profile_page.enable_ai_trainer_description: Enable the AI trainer toggle above to configure your coaching preferences.
profile_page.coaching_style_motivational_example: You've got this! Let's push through together.
profile_page.coaching_style_strict_example: Complete all sets as prescribed. No excuses.
profile_page.coaching_style_balanced_desc: Moderate approach balancing motivation and discipline
profile_page.coaching_style_balanced_example: Let's aim for consistency while listening to your body.
profile_page.coaching_style_technical_desc: Focus on form, technique, and science
profile_page.coaching_style_technical_example: Maintain proper form to maximize muscle activation.
profile_page.coaching_style_analytical_desc: Data-driven and technical, provides detailed insights
profile_page.coaching_style_analytical_example: Your squat form shows 15% improvement in depth consistency this week.
profile_page.coaching_style_educational_desc: Teaching-focused, explains the why behind recommendations
profile_page.coaching_style_educational_chars: Explains reasoning, Educational content, Learning focus
profile_page.coaching_style_educational_example: Deadlifts target your posterior chain, which improves posture and athletic performance.
profile_page.coaching_style_supportive_desc: Gentle and understanding, adapts to your emotional needs
profile_page.coaching_style_supportive_chars: Gentle approach, Emotional support, Adaptive tone
profile_page.coaching_style_supportive_example: I understand you had a tough day. Let's do a lighter workout today.
profile_page.coaching_style_challenging_desc: Pushes you to exceed your limits and achieve more
profile_page.coaching_style_challenging_chars: High expectations, Pushes limits, Achievement focus
profile_page.coaching_style_challenging_example: You're capable of more than you think. Let's add 10lbs to that lift.
profile_page.motivation_type_personal_desc: Focused on personal growth and health
